name: Les Canyons du Verdon
description:
Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

name: Lou Paradou
description:
The Lou Paradou hotel is located in Greoux-les-Bains, by the Verdon River, next to the lavender fields in the heart of the Provence. It is set within a large park and offers a heated, seasonal and heated outdoor pool.

The Lou Paradou offers air-conditioned studios equipped with a kitchenette, free Wi-Fi access in the rooms and a private balcony or terrace. Some studios have a view of the park and air conditioning.

A breakfast serving jams and fruit syrups both homemade is offered. The hotel is just 400 metres from Greoux village pedestrian centre and there is free on-site parking.

Guests can visit the Verdon Gorge, the largest canyon in Europe, the Luberon villages and Haute-Provence hilltop villages. Local leisure activities around Gréoux include hiking, mountain-bike, white-water sports, gliding and rock climbing.

Marseille Provence Airport is situated 80 km from the Hotel and Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 70 km away.

name: Auberge des Salles
description:
Situated in Les Salles-sur-Verdon, Auberge des Salles features a terrace with panoramic views of Lake de Sainte-Croix and the surrounding Verdon Natural Park. Hiking, fishing, and swimming are within 10 minutes' walk of the property.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet. Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills. A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

A buffet breakfast with hot drinks, orange juice, croissants, fresh bread with jams, honey and butter is served daily for a supplement. There is a bar on site.

The entrance to the Verdon Gorge is 6 km away and the village of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is a 20-minute drive away. Les Arcs-Draguignan Train Station is 55 km away and the Hyeres Airport is 115 km away. Free private parking and free WiFi are available at the property.

name: Le Chemin Neuf
description:

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 89 km from Le Chemin Neuf.

name: Gabrielle hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines. It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

name: Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon
description:
Boasting a terrace and free WiFi, Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon is situated in Baudinard.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon, rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. At Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon you will find a restaurant serving French and Mediterranean cuisine. A vegetarian option can also be requested.

The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 110 km from the hotel.

name: Le Vieux Château
description:
Situated in an 18th-century building, Le Vieux Château features rooms with free Wi-Fi, a bar and a terrace. Set in the centre of Aiguines, it opens on a Provençal-style square with bars and shops.

With views of the village, all of the rooms are located on the 2nd floor and include a private bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

A French breakfast is served every morning. You can also enjoy an ice cream at the bar or try one of the Provençal specialties proposed at the hotel’s restaurant which is closed every Thursday evening and Friday all day.

You can go sailing on the Sainte Croix Lake, which is 8 km away, or visit the Museum of Prehistory in Quinson, a 40-minute drive away. Le Vieux Château is accessible via the A51 motorway.

name: Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile
description:
Located in Les-Salles-sur-Verdon, Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile is just 200 metres from Sainte-Croix Lake and offers a garden and terrace. The Gorges du Verdon are 10 km away.

Decorated in a simple style, all rooms feature a wardrobe and private bathroom with free toiletries, while some also offer a balcony and views of the lake. Guest have access to the refrigerator.

A continental breakfast can be served each morning at Résidence Plein Voile. A bar, pizzeria and restaurant are conveniently situated just 50 metres from the property.

Watersports activities can be found 200 metres away at the lake and Moustiers Sainte-Marie is 12 km away. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the public areas and free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: Hôtel Spa L'Ermitage
description:

The rooms at Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage feature a balcony, en suite facilities with bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer, and a flat-screen TV. They also offer views of the pool. Some rooms have air conditioning.

Breakfast, lunch and dinner can be reserved upon arrival. The restaurant serves local and traditional cuisine, and the bar offers a wide range of cocktails all year long.

Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage is 5 km from the Verdon Gorge and the Lake of Sainte Croix is 800 metres away.  Nearby outdoor activities include hiking, swimming in the Lake, paragliding and canyoning. Free parking and free WiFi are available on site.

name: Ma Petite Auberge
description:

The heated rooms offer a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower and includes free toiletries.  Some offer a view of the terrace and the village’s place.

A continental breakfast is available every morning, and you can enjoy lunch and dinner in the park beside the 100-year-old Tilia Tree. Grocers can be found within 1 km.

It is 40 km from Dignes Train Station. Grasse is located 65 km from Ma Petite Auberge, while Cannes is 82 km away. A free, private car park is available on site.

name: Hotel du Levant

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the restaurant. The hotel’s restaurant serves French cuisine.

Hotel du Levant is 6.2 km from Lac de Castillon, 65 km from Grasse and 82 km from Cannes.

Each room at Hôtel Les Muses is equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a terrace and air conditioning.

A breakfast buffet is served daily. Activities in the surroundings include hiking and water-skiing. The Lake of Annecy is 50 metres away, and the lake's beach is 250 metres from the property.

Free private parking is available on site. Hôtel Les Muses's multilingual staff can provide local tourist information.

name: Ace Hotel Annecy
description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, Ace Hotel Annecy is located in Seynod. Free WiFi access is available in public areas and the rooms. The property is within 5 km from Lake Annecy and Annecy’s city centre.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and satellite channels. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk and a wardrobe.

At Ace Hotel Annecy you will find vending machines and a dining room where a breakfast is served each morning. The hotel is in a shopping area and a variety of restaurants can be found within 300 metres.

Facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and cycling. Lac d’Annecy Golf Course is a 25-minute drive from the hotel.

Free parking is available on site. Annecy Train Station is 3.4 km away. Public transit to the city centre of Annecy is just 100 metres away, and operates Mon-Sat.

name: Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Annency, a few steps from the castle. It offers individually-decorated rooms with views of the canals, the medieval castle or the town.

Each air-conditioned guest-room in the 18th-century building has satellite TV, WiFi internet access and a private bathroom.

The Palais de l’Isle serves a daily buffet breakfast and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar. Guests are also able to purchase snack jars.

The Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle is just a few minutes’ walk from Lake Annecy and the cathedral. The property offers discount in the 3 nearby public car parks.

name: Zenitude Hôtel-Résidences Les Hauts d'Annecy
description:
Zenitude Hôtel - Résidences Les Hauts d'Annecy offers accommodation in Seynod, 2 km from central Annecy and 3 km from Lake Annecy. The studios and apartments in Zenitude Hôtel - Résidences Les Hauts d'Annecy have a contemporary décor and offers a reception working hours between 6.15 am - 10.30 pm . Free WiFi is provided in all rooms.

The apartments feature a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower or bathtub. Provided with bath towels and bed linen, each apartment has self-catering facilities and is cleaned weekly.

Zenitude Hôtel - Résidences Les Hauts d'Annecy is a 45-minute drive to La Clusaz and Grand Bornand ski resorts. Guests can also explore Annecy Old Town, Annecy Cathedral and Palais de l’Isle.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

name: All Suites Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, 3.3 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, All Suites Besançon features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 4.4 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi. At All Suites Besançon rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Micropolis is 5.7 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 61 km from All Suites Besançon.

name: Hôtel de Bonlieu
description:
Located 500 metres away from Lake Annecy, and a 12-minute walk from Annecy castle, Hôtel de Bonlieu offers accommodation with free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All rooms air air-conditioned and soundproofed. They are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower.

Hôtel de Bonlieu provides a continental breakfast buffet daily. Guests can also choose to have breakfast served directly to your room.

Public parking is available nearby. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the train station and a 35-minute drive from Chambéry-Savoie airport.

name: Hôtel Catalpa
description:
Set just off the banks of Lake Annecy, this hotel is 1.5 km from the centre of town.

The rooms at Hôtel Catalpa include an LCD TV with satellite channels. They also provide free toiletries in the en-suite bathroom.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast in your guest room or in the hotel’s dining room.

You can also park your car in the hotel’s private parking with an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

Annecy Casino is 300 meters away, and a public beach is 300 metres away from the property.

A traditional restaurant is available for lunch and dinner on Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturday and Sundays for lunch only

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy
description:
Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy is located just 3.5 km from Annecy Lake and a 4-minute drive from Annecy city centre. It offers rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and has a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served daily. The restaurant serves traditional French dishes and offers a terrace.

There is also a bar and lounge area with a pool table, a pinball machine and table football, and a playground for children. Ironing facilities and a selection of board games are available at the reception upon request.

Guests can enjoy private access for 1 or 2 people to the sensory relaxation area upon reservation and at an additional cost. The space includes a balneo hot tub with massage jets and light therapy, a sauna, a video wall and a starry sky.

The region has many activities to offer, such as paragliding and rock-climbing. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel des Marquisats
description:
Just 200 metres from Lake Annecy, Hotel des Marquisats features spectacular views of the lake and the Alps. It is a 20-minute walk from the centre of Annecy and offers a continental breakfast. Free parking is available and free WiFi access is provided in the entire property.

Each room at the Hotel des Marquisats is individually decorated. They are equipped with satellite channels on a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by lift.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s lounge bar, which features a wall carved into the natural rock face and large bay windows facing the lake. There is also a sauna and hammam, available at an extra cost.

The property is 2 km from Annecy Train Station and a 45-minute drive to Geneva International Airport.

name: Hôtel AKENA BESANCON
description:
Situated in Besançon, 10 km from Micropolis, Hôtel AKENA BESANCON features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 16 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms at Hôtel AKENA BESANCON have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 17 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 48 km from Hôtel AKENA BESANCON.

name: Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City
description:
This Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is located in Besançon and offers studios and apartments with free WiFi access. It is next to the Doubs River and 2 km from the town’s train station.

Accommodation at the Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is serviced by a lift and has a living room with, free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. Each apartment also has, wire internet access and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room. This residence also provides a bike storage room, laundry facilities, a garage and free Wi-Fi at the reception.

The Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is a 10-minute walk from the city centre and 1.5 km from the Cathedral Saint-Jean. A Tramway Station can be reached within a 2-minute walk and provides direct access to Besançon Viotte Train Station.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

name: Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin
description:
Close to Alsace and Jura, this hotel is easily accessible from the A36 motorway. It is situated in the village of Ecole-Valentin, a 5 minute drive from Besançon. Free WiFi is provided.

The Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin offers air-conditioned guest rooms. Each is equipped with a TV with satellite, Canal + and beIN Sports channels. The private bathroom includes a shower and towels.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the stylish breakfast room. Free private parking for cars and buses is provided on site.

The Première Classe Besançon is located in the Franche-Comté region. In the surrounding area guests can visit Besançon’s miroctechnics pole.

name: Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville
description:
Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville is set in Besançon, 6.6 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville.

name: B&B HOTEL Annecy Cran-Gevrier
description:
Situated within 35 km of Rochexpo and 36 km of Bourget Lake, B&B HOTEL Annecy Cran-Gevrier features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Annecy. The property is located 41 km from Stade de Genève, 44 km from Jet d'Eau and 44 km from St. Pierre Cathedral. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at B&B HOTEL Annecy Cran-Gevrier can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Gare de Cornavin is 45 km from the accommodation, while United Nations Geneva is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 41 km from B&B HOTEL Annecy Cran-Gevrier.

name: Impérial Palace
description:
Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided.

Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room.

The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast.

The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre.

Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: greet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrier
description:
Hotel greet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrieris located in Cran-Gevrier, just 5 km form the centre of Annecy and from Lac d’Annecy. The hotel proposes free Wi-Fi internet access, a terrace and a garden.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at greet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrier feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They include a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms have reduced mobility access.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning at igreet hôtel Annecy Cran-Gevrier and the hotel also has a 24-hour reception.

Free private parking is possible on site and exit 16 of the A41 motorway is a 5-minute drive away. The property is 5.6 km from Château d’Annecy, 40 km from Genève and 32 km from Aix-les-Bains.

name: Le Boutik Hotel
description:
Boasting a garden, terrace and free WiFi, Le Boutik Hotel offers accommodation with a unique decor, set in Annecy. It is located 300 metres from Palais de l'Ile and a 4-minute walk from Chateau d'Annecy.

At the hotel, all rooms are individually decorated, the rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Ipads are available on request before your arrival to watch TV.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. It consists of cheese, cold meats, pastries, cakes, bread, pancakes, fresh fruits and fruit juices. Brunch is also served on Sundays upon reservation.

Staff speaking English, French and Italian is available anytime to helps guests.

The property is located 200 metres from Church of Saint-Francois de Sales, and 450 metres from the Bridge of Love. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 49 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis Besançon Centre la City
description:
Located on the banks of the Doubs River within the business complex known as La City, this ibis hotel is a 10-minute walk from Besançon city centre and its museums and a 35-minute walk from Citadelle.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

name: Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin
description:
Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin is a 3-star hotel with a terrace located in Besançon. The hotel features a shared lounge and free WiFi. Ecole-Valentin train station is 400 metres from the property.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The rooms include a private bathroom and a bath. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Besançon Viotte train station is 4.3 km away and Franche-Comté TGV train station is 8.7 km away. Micropolis is 8 km from Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin
description:
Set in Besançon, 6.5 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.6 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station.

At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe. At B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers a sun terrace.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 7.7 km from the hotel, while Micropolis is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 59 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin.

name: ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare
description:
Located in Besançon, just 100 metres from Gare de la Viotte Train Station, ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour access.

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily.

The palace Granvelle is 2 km from the hotel, and the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Citadel Vaubon is 2.5 km away. Besançon town centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Campanile Besançon Nord Ecole Valentin
description:
The Campanile Besançon Valentin is located near the A36 motorway (exit Saint Claude) and 5.8 km from Besançon and Besançon Viotte TGV Station. It offers guestrooms with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Campanile are equipped with flat-screen TVs with Canal+ channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Each includes a private bathroom, and family rooms are also available.

Guests can enjoy traditional French cuisine in the on-site restaurant, followed by a drink in the private bar. The hotel also provides a night porter.

Besançon, a hilly town with twisting streets dominated by a citadel, is known for its delightful setting and fine parks. The hotel is located between the new TGV station and the town centre.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy.

The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost.

Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost.

Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Allobroges Park Hôtel
description:
Set in Annecy City Centre, this 3-star hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Annecy Chateau. It has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi access.

All guest room are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They offer work desk and an LCD TV. Some rooms feature exposed beams. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The onsite bar is open 24/7 and there is a terrace open during summer.

Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk from Allobroges Hotel. Private Parking is available upon prior reservation only and subject to availability. Annecy Train Station is 260 metres away.

name: Hôtel Le Pré Carré
description:
Le Pré Carré is a hotel located in the heart of Annecy, just 250 metres from Lake Annecy.

Guest rooms at Le Pré Carré are soundproofed and equipped with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

The hotel offers a buffet breakfast, which can be served in your room. Le Pré Carré also provides a business centre, a 24-hour reception and on-site parking.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Carlton Annecy
description:
Best Western Carlton Annecy is located in central Annecy at the medieval town's gates. Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk away.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine. Every room has a private bathroom while some rooms offer a mountain view.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel bar during the evenings. The hotel’s buffet breakfast can be served in the comfort of your room or in the dining room.

A private garage is available upon prior reservation and for an additional fee. The Best Western Carlton Annecy is situated 200 metres from the train station, bus stop and taxi rank.

name: Contact Hôtel Foch
description:
Situated a few steps from the Besançon train station and just 5 minutes from the city centre, the Hotel Foch offers quality comfort at an affordable price.

This charming hotel provides a panoramic view of downtown from its well-equipped guestrooms. Rooms feature shower or bath, TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

The Hotel Foch also provides 24-hour reception, a car park just 20 metres from the hotel, a bar area and a buffet breakfast. 

Besançon is located close to the Swiss border and is the capital of the Doubs department in the region of Franche-Comté.

name: Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa
description:
Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa offers accommodation 50 metres from Viotte train station and just 15 minutes' walking distance from the historic city centre of Besançon. Many rooms open onto an inner garden.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

name: ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin
description:
The ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin is located just off the A36 motorway and 6 km from the centre of Besançon. It is 1 km from École-Valentin Train Station. The hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property, free parking and newspapers in its lobby.

The rooms at ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin are decorated in a contemporary style and feature a flat-screen TV. Each one also has an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the breakfast room. After breakfast you may choose to drive along the A36 motorway to Dijon or Montbéliard, both less than 50 minutes away.

Several restaurants and supermarkets can be found nearby and a wellness sports club is less than a 10-minutes' walk away from the hotel.

name: Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge
description:
Set in Besançon, 3.2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.6 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

All guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like hiking.

Micropolis is 7.9 km from Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Novel Restaurant La Mamma
description:
Hotel Novel Restaurant La Mamma is located in Annecy, a 5-minute drive from the lake. Free public parking is possible at the property.

Each guest room has a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free WiFi internet.

La Mamma serves traditional Italian or French cuisine and regional specialties. Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel bar.

Central Annecy is a 5-minute drive or bus travel from the hotel, where guests can visit Annecy Cathedral. Hotel Novel Restaurant La Mamma is 1.5 km from the Parc des Sports and 4 km from A41 highway.

name: Ibis Annecy - Cran-Gevrier
description:
Ibis Annecy - Cran-Gevrier is a 5-minute drive to the centre of Annecy and its lake. It offers comfortable and affordable rooms perfect for a short stay or stopover in the area.

Guestrooms are modern and equipped with en suite facilities. Wi-Fi internet access is available in the entire hotel and is free of charge.

At Ibis Annecy - Cran-Gevrier you are welcome 24 hours a day. All public and private spaces are non-smoking and parking is available onsite for an additional charge.

name: Campanile Annecy - Cran Gevrier
description:
Campanile Annecy - Cran Gevrier is 3 km from the city center and the lake and Annecy train station and 5 km from Annecy-Methet airport.

It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a courtesy tray with an electric kettle and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Some rooms can accommodate people with reduced mobility. Free private parking is available.

Along the way in our beautiful region, come and discover the wonders of Haute Savoie:
Lake Annecy, Gorges du Fier, Le Château de Montrottier. Here, it's an ideal stopover before going up to the beautiful resorts of the Alps: La Clusaz, Le Grand Bornand, Chamonix . and 30 minutes away, escape to Geneva, the city of Calvin.

The on-site restaurant is open Monday to Thursday evening for dinner and Monday to Friday noon for lunch. It is closed from Friday evening to Sunday evening. It serves traditional and family cuisine.

Other facilities at Campanile Annecy include air conditioning, a terrace.
 The pet supplement is 10 euros per pet per night.

name: Apparthotel Privilodges Le Royal
description:
Apparthotel Privilodges Le Royal is located 200 metres from Annecy Lake and 350 metres from the Palais de l’Isle Jail in the heart of the old town.  It offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi.

The air-conditioned studios and apartments at Privilodges Le Royal feature neutral decor. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area are provided in each. Bed linen, towels are included in the price.

The kitchenettes are fully equipped with a fridge/freezer, hot-plates and a microwave oven.  A vacuum cleaner, iron and iron board are available upon request.

 At an additional cost, breakfast can be taken in your apartment and it is served as a buffet. Guests at Privilodges Le Royal Apparthotel also have access to a fitness room and luggage storage.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 650 metres from the hotel. Chateau d’Annecy is 600 metres away through the Old Town. A limited number of private parking spaces are available for an extra charge, upon reservation. Paying public parking is available nearby.

name: Zenitude Hôtel-Résidences Les Hauts Du Chazal
description:
This residence is located next to the big shopping center Chateaufarineau, only 15 minutes away from the city centre. The Zenitude Hôtel & Résidence Les Hauts Du Chazal benefits from pleasant and quiet surroundings. Guests benefit from a 24-hour reception.

Each room is equipped with free WiFi access, satellite TV, a kitchenette with microwave and a small dining area. For stays between 4 and 7 nights, cleaning service is provided once. It is provided once a week for stays of 8 nights or more.

You have the opportunity to eat with our take-out gourmet formulas composed of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax with a tasty meal.

At The Zenitude Hôtel & Résidence Les Hauts Du Chazal a buffet breakfast is served daily. A secure garage is at your disposal.

Guests will find many sites to visit, such as the Cathedral of Saint John, and several museums such as the Fine Arts Museum. A tram stop 20 metres from the property provides direct access to the train station and city centre in 20 minutes.

name: Hôtel de Paris
description:
Located in the centre of Besançon, Hôtel de Paris offers contemporary décor, a 24-hour reception and terrace. The Besançon Citadelle is just a 15-minute walk away. Vesoul is 48 km from the property.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, wardrobe and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hôtel de Paris. A traditional restaurants can be found within walking distance.

The fine arts museum is just a 5-minute walk away and Besançon Franche-Comté TGV Train Station is 12 km from the hotel. Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and free wired internet.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine
description:
Featuring free WiFi, B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine offers pet-friendly accommodation 2 km from the centre of Besançon, 10 km from Besançon Citadelle. Free private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Cable channels are also provided. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Micropolis is 2.3 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine, while Besançon Hospital is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 53 km from the property.

name: Hotel Régina
description:
Hotel Régina is situated conveniently in Besançon, and features a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is set 4.8 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 500 metres from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have garden views. The units feature a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Time museum of Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Hotel Régina.

name: Centre Jean XXIII
description:
Offering a sun terrace, Centre Jean XXIII is situated in Annecy, 3 km from the old town and 1.8 km from Lake Annecy. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Certain units feature views of the lake or city. Every room comes with a private bathroom. The rooms are not air-conditioned.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including skiing and windsurfing. Water sports facilities are offered on the lake. Chateau d'Annecy is 3.1 km from Centre Jean XXIII, while UBISOFT is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Geneva International Airport, 46 km from Centre Jean XXIII.

name: Auberge du Lyonnais
description:
Attractively located in the centre of Annecy, Auberge du Lyonnais features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Well situated in the Old Town district, this hotel provides a bar. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, some rooms at the hotel also boast a city view. The rooms in Auberge du Lyonnais are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

À la carte and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.

Rochexpo is 35 km from Auberge du Lyonnais, while Bourget Lake is 36 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville
description:
Located just 700 metres from Lake Annecy, ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville features a 24-hour front desk, a luggage storage room and free WiFi. Public parking is available nearby at a surcharge, depending on availability.

The guest rooms are equipped with a desk, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:30.. Guests can also relax with a drink at the ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville’s bar.

Annecy Train Station is just 500 metres away from the hotel.

name: Premiere Classe Annecy Cran-Gevrier
description:
Premiere Classe Annecy Sud is located in Annecy and features a garden. This 1-star hotel offers free WiFi and is a 15-minute walk from Chateau d'Annecy.

All rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property.

Lake Annecy and Annecy town centre with its shops, restaurants and market are located within 3 km from the hotel. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 47 km away.

name: Campanile Besançon-Ouest Châteaufarine
description:
Part of the Campanile group, this hotel is situated 7 km west of the centre of Besancon. It offers a bar and a terrace. The hotel offers secure on-site parking, free high-speed WiFi access and a 24-hour reception.

The rooms feature satellite TV, free newspapers and a private bathroom. There is also a welcome tray in each room.

You will be able to dine in the on-site restaurant, which is open every day. A breakfast buffet including fresh fruit and pastries is served each morning and regional cuisine with a starter and dessert buffet is available for lunch and dinner.

Vesoul is 52 km from the property.  The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 53 km from the property.

name: Accueil Hotel Besançon
description:
Set in Besançon, 4.4 km from Micropolis, Accueil Hotel Besançon offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 7.9 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 9 km from Accueil Hotel Besançon, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 53 km from the accommodation.

name: hotelF1 Besancon Ouest Micropolis
description:
Hotelf1 Besancon Ouest Micropolis - offers accommodation in Besançon, 1 km from Micropolis Convention Centre. Free WiFi and free parking are provided on site.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a shared bathroom. Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

A breakfast buffet is available every morning at an extra charge.

Hotelf1 Besancon Ouest Micropolis is a 20-minute drive from Besancon city centre and Saint-Jean Cathedral.

name: Zanzibar Suite
description:
Zanzibar Suite features accommodation situated 800 metres from the centre of Besançon and offers a garden and a bar. This property offers access to a terrace, pool at the pool table, free private parking and free WiFi. The aparthotel has spa facilities and a 24-hour front desk.

The air-conditioned aparthotel consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes. A flat-screen TV with streaming services is offered. The aparthotel offers bed linen, towels and housekeeping service.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy an à la carte breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. For visitors looking to embark on day trips to nearby landmarks, Zanzibar Suite provides a selection of packed lunches.

A variety of wellness packages are available for guests to get rejuvenated in-house. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like walking tours. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Zanzibar Suite, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Time museum of Besançon and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Zanzibar Suite.

name: Bali Suite
description:
Situated 2 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station and 3.2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station in the centre of Besançon, Bali Suite features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Attractively set in the Besancon Old Town district, this aparthotel offers a bar, as well as spa facilities and wellness packages. The aparthotel provides a sun terrace and a 24-hour front desk.

The aparthotel consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom and a living room. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available.

Bike hire and car hire are available at the aparthotel and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Guests at Bali Suite can enjoy billiards on-site, or walking tours in the surroundings.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Bali Suite.

name: Hotel Calisola
description:
Hotel Calisola has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Chalezeule. This 3-star hotel offers room service and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 5.1 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. The rooms in Hotel Calisola are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Chalezeule, like cycling.

Besancon Viotte Train Station is 5.5 km from Hotel Calisola, while Micropolis is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 66 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel le Comtois
description:
Situated in Saône, 10 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station, Hôtel le Comtois features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Hôtel le Comtois offers some rooms with city views, and all rooms come with a patio. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play darts at Hôtel le Comtois, and the area is popular for hiking and fishing.

Besancon Viotte Train Station is 12 km from the hotel, while Micropolis is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 69 km from Hôtel le Comtois.

name: ibis Strasbourg Centre Historique
description:
Ibis Strasbourg Centre Historique is set in Strasbourg, within 1.3 km of Strasbourg History Museum and 3.5 km of St. Paul's Church. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All guest rooms feature a desk.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at ibis Strasbourg Centre Historique.

Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 10 km from ibis Strasbourg Centre Historique.

name: City Résidence Strasbourg Centre
description:
City Résidence Strasbourg Centre is located 1 km from Strasbourg Train Station and 1.5 km from La Petite France district in Strasbourg city. It offers 24-hour reception and self-catering accommodation with soundproofing. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The spacious suites have a flat-screen TV, a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette. Each accommodation has a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at City Résidence Strasbourg Centre can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet in the dining hall.

The City Résidence Strasbourg Centre is a 20-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral and 2 km from the Strasbourg Exhibition Centre.

name: Hotel Victoria
description:
The hotel welcomes you in a warm atmosphere. Enjoy a privileged location in the city centre, close the banks of the Ill river, a few minutes away from the railway station.

Hotel Victoria is well served by public transport (tramway, bus and shuttles to Francfort and Basel/Mulhouse). 

The hotel boasts a tremendous location to discover the Petite France, the Cathedral as well as the museums.

name: Hôtel Diana Dauphine
description:
Hôtel Diana Dauphine is just 750 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral and a 10-minute walk from the Petite-France quarter of the city. It features a 24-hour reception and free WiFi throughout.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. Each modern room at Diana Dauphine has a marble bathroom.

A buffet breakfast including hot drinks, French pastries and cheese is served every morning in the dining room.

With paid private parking on site, this hotel is accessible via the N4 motorway. The Alsatian Museum is 400 metres away.

name: Appart'City Confort Strasbourg Centre
description:
Conveniently located in the centre of Strasbourg, Appart'City Strasbourg is a 10-minute walk from the train station. This Green Key-awarded property offers self-catering studios with a view of the city. Fiber optic internet access is provided.

Decorated in a contemporary style, the apartments feature a flat-screen TV, individual heating and en suite facilities with a shower. The kitchenette includes a dishwasher, kitchenware and a refrigerator.

A buffet breakfast is available daily upon request. Breakfast is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided.

Luggage storage is possible for an extra cost per suitcase.

Strasbourg International Airport is 17 km from Appart'City Strasbourg and private on-site parking is available with prior reservation at an extra cost.

name: Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live
description:
Attractively set in the centre of Strasbourg, Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 600 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and French.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel LÉONOR the place to live include St. Paul's Church, Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and Strasbourg History Museum. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Premiere Classe Strasbourg Ouest
description:
Premiere Classe Strasbourg Ouest is a 5-minute drive from the city centre and Strasbourg Zénith. It offers en suite guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access, just 400 metres from Jean Monet bus stop and a 5-minute walk from Poteries Tramway Stop.

Each room has a private bathroom with shower. Four rooms are specially designed with wheelchair access and other features for the disabled.

Parking at 4€/day is available on reservation at Premiere Classe Strasbourg Ouest. The all-you-can-eat breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s breakfast lounge. A microwave is at guests' disposal in the hotel's common areas.

Premiere Classe Strasbourg Ouest is a 5-minute drive from the A4 and A35 motorways providing easy access to the European Institutions, the exhibition park and the conference hall.

name: BOMA easy living hotel
description:
BOMA easy living hotel is set in Strasbourg, 300 metres from The 'Petite France'. Guests can enjoy the on-site bistrot. Free WiFi is offered.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. A minibar is featured in each room and soft drinks are free of charge.

You will find a 24-hour front desk and 1 meeting room at the property.

Private parking is possible at a reduced rate. Strasbourg Cathedral is 600 metres from BOMA easy living hotel, while Strasbourg Christmas Market is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 15 km away.

name: EtC...Hôtel - Strasbourg Hyper Centre
description:
EtC…Hôtel is in Strasbourg near the Petite France district. It offers modern guestrooms and a peaceful environment.

All of the guestrooms are equipped with private bathrooms, flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi internet access. The entire hotel is non-smoking.

Breakfast is served daily in the pleasant dining area from 07:00 to 10:00.

The central location of the EtC...Hôtel puts you just 400 metres from the famous Strasbourg Cathedral located in the heart of the city.

name: HANNONG Hotel & Wine Bar
description:
The Hannong Hotel is located in the heart of Strasbourg, just a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station, Petite France district and the Cathedral. It offers free Wi-Fi access.

Guest rooms at the Hannong are air conditioned and soundproofed. They are equipped with hardwood floors, European designed furniture, satellite TV and each have a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning in the Hannong’s breakfast room. It includes hot drinks, handmade bread and French pastries, local products, jams and juices. Guests can enjoy a drink at the wine bar in the glass ceiling salon or on the large terrace.

Hotel Hannong is just 100 metres from the Tramway Central Station, Place de l'Homme de Fer. Strasbourg Train Station is a 9-minute walk from the property.

name: Hôtel Gutenberg
description:
Ideally situated in the city centre of Strasbourg, opposite the cathedral and next to the historic district of La Petite France, the Hotel Gutenberg has free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Hotel Gutenberg offers uniquely decorated and soundproofed rooms which are equipped with air-conditioning, cable on a flat-screen TV and a courtesy tray.

The hotel’s facilities are 24-hour reception and a buffet breakfast. Paid parking is available in a location nearby.

Stroll along the river and marvel at 15th-century Gothic architecture of the world’s 4th tallest cathedral, or discover the charm of the city’s inhabitants and its unique Franco-German culture.

name: Cerise Strasbourg
description:
With a 24-hour reception, the Cerise Strasbourg Residence offers modern self-catering studios and apartments 750 metres from Meinau Stadium. It is a 5-minute walk to Lycee Couffignal tram stop, giving direct access to Strasbourg centre in 10 minutes.

Apartments and studios at the Cerise Strasbourg include free WiFi access, en suite facilities and a kitchenette with microwave. A TV and a fan are also provided. All are accessible by lift.

Additional services at the Cerise Strasbourg include a daily buffet breakfast, laundry facilities, a bike storage service, and secure on-site parking. You can dine at one of the property's partner restaurants, reserve a meal basket on-site or order delivery to be enjoyed in your room.

The Cerise Strasbourg Residence is just a 20-minute drive from the European Parliament, which can be reached directly via tram.

name: Holiday Inn Express Strasbourg Centre, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located a 10-minute walk from Strasbourg’s pedestrian area, Holiday Inn Express Centre offers free internet access and a free buffet continental breakfast.

All rooms feature a desk, safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV with international channels. Tea and coffee making facilities are also provided. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and some rooms have a sofa bed.

The hotel's bar is open from 12:00 until 23:00.

Additional features include a laundry service and private parking are available by prior reservation and at an extra cost. The hotel is 1.1 km from the Petite France area, 1.2 km from Strasbourg Cathedral and 1.2 km from Strasbourg Christmas Market. The Alsace Wine Route and Europa Park can be accessed directly from the nearby French and German motorways.

name: ibis Styles Strasbourg Avenue du Rhin
description:
The ibis Styles Strasbourg Avenue du Rhin is located in Strasbourg, a 10-minute drive from the cathedral, La Petite France district and the European Parliament. Rhena Clinic is 1.2 km away.

The air-conditioned rooms include free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV. They are decorated in a modern style and they will provide you with a walk-in shower in the bathrooms. A hairdryer is also provided.

At ibis Styles Strasbourg Avenue du Rhin, you will find a bar, which has a contemporary decor. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning.

The hotel is 4.6 km from Strasbourg Train Station. Strasbourg Entzheim Airport is 13 km away, and the A4 motorway is 3 km from the property. Private underground parking is available on site. Aristide Briand Tram Stop is situated next to the hotel, while the Europa-Park Theme Park is 40 minutes away by car and the German border is 1 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Monopole Métropole
description:
Best Western Monopole Métropole is located just 400 metres from Strasbourg Train Station, next to La Petite France district. It offers contemporary accommodation with a minibar and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Monopole Métropole are contemporary in style and decorated in neutral tones. Each is air-conditioned and offers an electric kettle and some rooms have a seating area.

A buffet breakfast with scrambled eggs and bacon is served every morning in the elegant, Alsatian-style breakfast room. The hotel also has a modern bar with paintings by local artists, where guests can relax in one of the armchairs.

The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Place Kléber and Strasbourg Cathedral. The Métropole can be accessed from the A35, just a 4-minute drive away, and private underground parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Les Haras
description:
Set in a historical building of the 18th century, this hotel is located in Strasbourg, only 200 metres from the city centre. Hotel Les Haras features a spa and offers massages with CODAGE products. Free Wi-Fi, a business centre and private parking can also be found on site.

Hôtel Les Haras features air-conditioned rooms with a safe, electric kettle and LCD TV. The bathrooms are equipped with free toiletries, bathrobes and slippers.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning. A bar is also at your disposal on site. The hotel's site is shared by La Brasserie Les Haras. Restaurant does not belong to the hotel. Guests wishing to dine at this restaurant are advised to reserve in advance. We can help you in making a reservation. With a 24-hour reception, the property also provides a dry cleaning service, daily newspapers and meeting facilities.

Located 1 km from the cathedral and 500 metres from the Modern Art Museum, Hôtel Les Haras is accessible via the A35 motorway, which is 2 km away. The European Parliament is 3.5 km away and Strasbourg Aiport is 16 km away.

name: Hôtel Du Dragon
description:
Hotel Du Dragon in Strasbourg is housed in a 17th century building, surrounding a peaceful patio garden. It is a 5-minute walk to the Cathedral  and Porte de l'Hôpital Tram Stop and a 2-minute walk from the Petite France district.

Rooms are modern, comfortable and fully equipped with flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, telephone and en suite bathroom. Some rooms overlook the the patio, the Cathedral or Saint Thomas Church.

Friendly staff can offer personalised advice on things to do in the area as well as shops, restaurants and nightlife. There are guided tours available from reception including a vineyard tour.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the Hotel Du Dragon and room service is available 24 hours a day. The A35 motorway is a 2-km drive away and 600 metres from the New Civil Hospital. Paid private parking is available at the property.

name: Hotel & Spa REGENT PETITE FRANCE
description:
Hôtel Régent Petite France & Spa is located in the centre of Strasbourg, in the heart of the Petite France district of the city. It is set in a converted 17th-century mill and offers an on-site restaurant and a wellness centre with a sauna, hammam and massage treatments. A WiFi internet connection is available in entire hotel and private parking is available upon reservation.

Each of the rooms at Hôtel Régent Petite France & Spa offer a view on the picturesque neighborhood of La Petite France, either overlooking the river Ill or the traditional half-timbered houses of Alsace. Rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom, satellite TV and a minibar.

Guests have the choice between a buffet or continental breakfast served respectively in the lounge or in your accommodation. On site, the Champagne bar offers more than 20 types of champagne as well as a menu of dishes with creations offering a culinary journey with multiple horizons. The view of Petite France contributes to travel and escape in a warm and intimate atmosphere.

Hôtel Régent Petite France & Spa is 1 km from Strasbourg Central Train Station. Strasbourg Cathedral and the The Alsatian Museum are a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg
description:
Situated just 3.6 km from Zénith de Strasbourg, Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg features accommodation in Strasbourg with access to a fitness centre, a bar, as well as a 24-hour front desk. The aparthotel provides a spa experience, with its spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a kettle, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a well-fitted kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher and an oven. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. At Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg, the restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and cocktails and specialises in French cuisine.

The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and bike hire is available at this 4-star aparthotel. Walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

St. Paul's Church is 5.4 km from the accommodation, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 13 km from Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg.

name: Hotel Roses
description:
This hotel features 34 rooms decorated on specific-rose theme. They all include soundproofing and bright and spacious spaces.

Start the day with a generous and tasty Alsatian buffet breakfast before setting off for a day sightseeing.
Cheese and cured meat plates can also be ordered.

The Hotel Roses boasts a privileged location near the Ill River, Strasbourg Cathedral and Rohan Palace. Paid public parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Athena Spa
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Athena Spa is located less than 3 km from the centre of Strasbourg and features a fitness centre that is open 24 hours a day. This design hotel has an à la carte restaurant, a bar and 24-hour reception. There is an sensory pool, open everyday available free of charge.

With free WiFi, the design and colorful rooms here provide a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning and facilities for making tea and coffee. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning and the bar is open every day from midday to midnight.

Guests can access the wellness area and the hotel's spa which has an sensory pool with hydromassage jets, a hammam, a Finnish sauna, a tropical sauna, a relaxation area and a multi-sensory shower.

A limited number of free outdoor, secure private parking spaces are available at this hotel and there is also an underground car park requiring an additional fee. Two charging stations for electric vehicles are available for an extra charge. It is 2.5 km from The 'Petite France' and 3 km from Strasbourg Cathedral. Strasbourg International Airport is 8 km away.

name: Château de Pourtalès
description:
Château de Pourtalès is located in the north area of Strasbourg. It has witnessed years of European history, welcoming some of the most important musicians, philosophers and poets. It provides a spa area with Finnish sauna and relaxing facilities and which has direct access to the garden.

Château de Pourtalès offers rooms set in one of the property's 3 buildings, each with a different ambiance. The rooms in the Château and the Château Annexe are decorated in a traditional style and have authentic features. The rooms in the Park building are more modern and feature decor inspired by the environment.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Guests can enjoy walking and relaxing in the gardens around the Château.

Free private parking is available onsite.

name: Pavillon REGENT PETITE FRANCE
description:
Pavillon Régent Petite France is located in the heart of Strasbourg. It offers free WiFi access. The Covered Bridges are a 3-minute walk from this hotel.

Each room here will provide you with a private bathroom including a shower. Tea and coffee making facilities are also offered. You can enjoy River views from the rooms.

Breakfast is served every day.

Strasbourg Train Station is located 800 metres away from the property. Notre-Dame Cathedral is 800 metres from the hotel and the Strasbourg Museum of Modern Art is an 8-minute walk away. Strasbourg Airport is situated 17 km from the property.

name: Citadines Kléber Strasbourg
description:
Located next to Place Kléber, this Citadines Apart'hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Strasbourg SNCF Train Station. It offers fully-furnished apartments serviced by an elevator and equipped with free Wi-Fi access.

Apartments at the Citadines Apart'hotel Strasbourg Kléber feature a flat-screen TV, DVD player and desk in the seating area. They each have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher and linen and towels are provided.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room.

Private parking is available on site at an additional cost. The hotel also has a launderette and offers a dry-cleaning service.

Strasbourg Cathedral and the Petite France area of the city are a 5-minute walk from the aparthotel. The Alsace Museum is 750 metres away.

name: Hôtel Campanile Strasbourg Aéroport Lingolsheim
description:
Campanile Hotel Strasbourg Aéroport is located near Strasbourg city centre and the Zenith. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and direct exterior access.

Each room is directly accessible from the outside and has modern décor. It is equipped with free WiFi access and tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer.

The restaurant prepares traditional French cuisine in the elegant dining area, and is open from Monday to Friday. You can also dine on the terrace.

Free private parking is provided. The German border is a 16-minute drive from Campanile Hotel Strasbourg Aéroport.
